pages.text: Graphite is one of the most important items you will need to start with. You can get it by $(l:geoactivity:machines/coal_refiner)Refinement$().

pages.title: Graphite
pages.text: Graphite may be considered the highest grade of coal, just above anthracite and alternatively called meta-anthracite, although it is not normally used as fuel because it is difficult to ignite.
